trans-unit.source: Provides a managed way of dynamically viewing, creating or invoking types supported by an XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 提供动态查看、 创建或调用 XML Web 服务支持的类型的托管的的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionReflector"></xref> class.
Creates a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> including the specified <xref:System.Type> for the XML Web service at the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>包括指定<xref:System.Type>为 XML Web 服务在指定的 URL。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This method examines the metadata for the XML Web service at the specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可检查在指定的 URL 的 XML Web 服务的元数据。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Type> is not supported, it modifies the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file corresponding to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> describing the XML Web service, in order to include that type.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定<xref:System.Type>是不受支持，修改 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 文件对应于<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>以便包含该类型描述 XML Web 服务。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的详细信息，请参阅在 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/ 规范。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the class or interface to reflect.
The address (URL) of the XML Web service.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref> associated with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas"></xref>与 XML Web 服务相关联。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> of zero.
Any members must be explicitly added using the collection's <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 任何成员必须显式添加使用集合的<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的详细信息，请参阅在 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/ 规范。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> associated with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref>与 XML Web 服务相关联。

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> of zero.
Any members must be explicitly added using the collection's <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 任何成员必须显式添加使用集合的<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection.Add%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 有关 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的详细信息，请参阅在 http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/ 规范。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> associated with the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref>与 XML Web 服务相关联。
